extendedInfo.description: "â¥ ABSOLUTLY LOVE IT â¥, I came pregnant after 2 Month using it ! Thanks My Days" Easy tracking and predicting period, ovulation and fertility. >> Highest Rating "4.8 Stars from 5" for all Ovulation Apps in the Market!>> What other claim to be, here it is true (compare yourself)>> This is the â highest rated â period tracker application in GooglePlay!MyDays X - Period & Ovulation Calender is the simplest way to track your last periods and help assess when you could expect to be ovulating. If you are trying to get pregnant, MyDays predict your most fertile days and lets you track your basal metabolic temperature (BMT). Many P&O apps you see in the market came inspired by MyDays , the first P&O Tracker on Google Play with Calendar. This (X)tended Version does offer even more Feature.â Multi User (track yourself, your daugther or close friend) â Password Lock for your Security â Add Text Infos, Remember if you took your pill â Overwrite the predicted ovulation with your manual set day. â Backup / Restore to your own PC (no need to upload your data somewhere) â Keep track of your blood flow and mood â Luteal phase is adjustable â Enable the option to see old predictions â Reset preferences and data should you lost overview â eMail your period History to your doctor â Get an overview by Chart for your temperature (BMT) and weight measures â Pregnancy Mode, disable period predictions and keeps you informed about your progress â Cycle Statistic gives you an overview about your last cycle lengths. â Choose the start day of the week â Cycle and Period Length can be calculated automaticaly â Unit Measures in Kg/Lbs Celcius/Fahrenheit â It's FREE ! - without any hidden in-app purchases Mention MyDays X next time you have a doctor's visit, or when you're unsure when to expect your next period. Busy woman on the go can't always remember the date of their last period. With a clear, simple user interface, MyDays keeps tracking your menstrual cycle easy and hassle-free. What other did say: â "Thank you, Thank you so much! My wife is pregnant now in the 3rd Month." â "AMAZZZZZINNG, I tried several P&O trackers, but MyDays is the best" â "First I thought it looks too simple, soon discovered how amazing it is." â "I am a Guy and track my wifes circle, so I know when I have to be special nice :)" MyDays X, the easy tracking & prediction calendar for your period, ovulation and fertility. -------- Remember: MyDays does pinpoint the 'high fertile' Days. But you can come pregnant also on other days! Usage on your own Responsibility. For more Help & Hint, see Preferences -> About -> Visit MyDays-Homepage -------- â Your âââââ Star Ratings keeps me working!

reviews.title: Very Simple and Useful!!
reviews.comment: I love this app. I have been using it for about 3 years now and on 4 different phones. Have never had a problem with using the app. It\'s simple to set up and use. Love it!!!!
reviews.author: Micky Riddick

reviews.title: Have been using it for two years now
reviews.comment: Absolutely love this app so easy to keep track of my period.  Def must for all women out there
reviews.author: Liz Jensen

reviews.comment: Excellent app...me and my husband keep track of everything during this time of baby making. .....my days makes it so easy.\tA++++ app. ..
reviews.author: venise torres

reviews.title: Love
reviews.comment: I really like this app however there should be section to save your data into an account. I\'ve lost history.
reviews.author: Monica Medina

reviews.comment: Love it! Works very well as a predictor! So much better than many apps out there.
reviews.author: Stacey Staudt

reviews.title: Excellent women\'s tracker!
reviews.comment: I tracked my period and ovulation for pregnancy prevention for 2 years with this app and then used it to have my now 1 year old daughter. The first time we tried for a baby we had one!
reviews.author: Michelle Curfiss

reviews.comment: Easy to keep track of important information. We\'ll soon see if helps praying for a baby soon
reviews.author: Becky Brooks

reviews.title: A must download!!
reviews.comment: Excellent app!! Well designed, accurate and very easy to use!! Thank you for this app...keep up the good work!!  ;-)
reviews.author: Crissy Orton

reviews.title: Organized
reviews.comment: In love with how I can track EVERYTHING even write notes if needed :)
reviews.author: Nelly Delgado

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using the app for years, I\'m downloading the newer version after pregnancy. As always impressed with the design and easy navigation. Love the fact that a pregnancy stage has been added. This app is as great as ever, a must have on every girls gadget :-)
reviews.author: Sinead Cadman

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: This app is so helpful! I don\'t have any extra papers to keep up, calculating, nothing! Ovulating && periods are already calculated for you. :))
reviews.author: Heather Landers

reviews.title: *Wow*
reviews.comment: This is crazy cool!! My best friend suggested I get this app to help me track my monthly and sure enough it\'s good. Very on point, I love it!
reviews.author: Jessica Gill

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: It constantly is crashing and foreclosing. Would be a helpful app if it would just work without crashing every single time I go to open it! Please fix this, I\'d love to be able to really use it!
reviews.author: Kathy Grasty

reviews.title: Nice app but keeps force closing
reviews.comment: This app keeps force closing as soon as I open it. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: Marcel Redfearn

reviews.title: Luv but needs update
reviews.comment: Dnt like to close. Would be 5stars once fix.
reviews.author: tiffany milligan

reviews.title: Shirley
reviews.comment: Love this app!!!! It works too good, I good pregnant without trying to, because I thought it didn\'t really work. And I didn\'t think I could have kids, and after couple month of using it, I got pregnant. So it turned out to be an accurate app...also great to know exactly when your period is going to come..
reviews.author: Shirley Howard

reviews.title: No more guess work
reviews.comment: I\'m able to plan better than ever! All men need this APP! SHE WILL LOVE YOU FOR THAT! Always show love and concern.
reviews.author: Aaron Grady

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Thank you so much for making this app. I am not trying to get pregnant so this helps me know which days I need to abstain.
reviews.author: Justin Durant

reviews.title: Excellent app.
reviews.comment: Very good application. Must recommend to all the ladies!
reviews.author: Salma Obaid

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Very clean, easy to use/understand, and extremely accurate!
reviews.author: Elizabeth Brumfield
